# LocoFace - AI Sticker Generator

## About
LocoFace is an AI-powered tool that transforms photos into cute chibi-style stickers instantly. Founded in 2024, it has been used by over 50,000 creators worldwide.

## Key Features
- Photo to chibi sticker conversion using advanced AI
- No account required - instant access
- Generation in seconds (typically 5-10 seconds)
- High-quality PNG output with transparent background
- Works with selfies, pet photos, and more

## Pricing
- Individual sticker: $1.99
- Starter Pack: $9.99 for 10 stickers (50% savings)

## Use Cases
- WhatsApp custom stickers
- Telegram sticker packs
- iMessage stickers
- Social media content
- Personal avatars
- Gift stickers for friends and family

## Technology
- Powered by OpenAI's image generation
- Built with Next.js 16
- Hosted on Vercel

## Contact
- Website: https://locoface.com
- Support: Via website contact form

## Social Proof
- 50,000+ happy creators
- 4.9/5 average rating
- Chibi/kawaii style specialized

## Unique Value Proposition
"Turn your face into cute chibi stickers in seconds" - LocoFace specializes in the chibi/kawaii aesthetic, offering the simplest and fastest way to create personalized stickers from any photo.
